entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating late in the morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening with 60 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and overnight. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
